greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of lim_{k->infinity} (A291481(k)^(1/k)).
comment: See comments from _Jon E. Schoenfield_ on A296564 for explanation of PARI program.
link: Iain Fox, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
program: my(S = [1, 2], n = 2, t = 3, L, nPrev, E);
for(j = 1, build, L = S[#S]; n = n*(1+L)-L; t = t*(1+L)-L^2; nPrev = #S; for(r = 1, L, for(i = 1, nPrev-1, S = concat(S, S[i]))));
for(j = build + 1, build + #E, L = E[#E+1-(j-build)]; n = n*(1+L)-L; t = t*(1+L)-L^2);
} \\ (gradually increase build to get more precise answers)
results.author: _Iain Fox_, Jan 07 2018
